div.ul: Update April 17th - On April 16th, Governor Evers directed an extension of the Safer at Home Order, which contains a provision that school buildings and school grounds remain closed through the 2019-20 school year. Digital learning will continue for the rest of the school year. For more information visit our COVID-19 page.

div.p: The School District of Oakfield is committed to planting the seeds of knowledge.
The School District of Oakfield is committed to nurturing the whole child.
The School District of Oakfield is committed to achieving academic excellence.
The School District of Oakfield is committed to enhancing educational opportunities.
...while being deeply rooted in strong community partnerships.
